articles.description: Deaths and cases continue to rise across the country
articles.content:
Coronavirus deaths in English hospitals has risen by 420 on New Year's Day - with one patient aged just eight years old.
Today's grim death toll brings the total number of confirmed deaths in our co… [+1623 chars]
